Articles.Content:
Im playing KSP for 3 Days now and already successfully landed on the moon and the planet next to it! I even brought my kerbals save home after the trip on the moon .

So after some time this got a little boring and i have seen a lot of nice youtube videos, where people have sort of space stations or moon stations and i would really like to know which mods i have to install to have the same ?Sorry for my bad english :x

Regards,Thunfisch
Welcome, you're doing great to land on Mun and Minmus! Check out the addons forum for all kinds of great mods.
Also, with new planets, make sure to get to them! use www.ksp.olex.biz for a great guide! Good luck!

hey thanks for your replys !

Could somebody here give me a list of the best mods out there and the best mod for a orbital space station? Sorry if this question got asked over and over again, but i seem to dont find any list and digging through all the plugins and mods for hours didnt show up a good result...

Hi Thunfisch, welcome to the community

There isn't really a "Best mods list" anymore as there are so many add-ons and they are all great, but if you want spacestation style parts, try the kosmos pack, deep space mission pack and the truss pack, plus the Dynasat pack for solar panels
